page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart definition axis interval number object
page.description: Definition of an axis of a chart.

property.name: from
property.description: How the interval is calculated. The values can be "size" (the default), "count" or "value".

property.name: size
property.description: When "from" is "size", the number of pixels to use as the minimum distance between marks. The default is "15".

property.name: count
property.description: When "from" is "count", an explicit number marks to be drawn. The default is "8".

property.name: value
property.description: When "from" is "value", the explicit value to use as an interval. The default is "1".
